snippet.title: Broadband Outage Checklist
snippet.summary: Run line diagnostics and confirm CPE status.
snippet.body: Check network alarms, ONT status LEDs, and customer power cycle attempts before scheduling a field visit.

steps.step: Run the automated line test and capture reference ID.
Ask the customer to reboot the ONT and wait two minutes.
Confirm LOS or PON LED status and document findings.

snippet.title: SIM Replacement Guidance
snippet.summary: Verify identity and provisioning before advising a SIM swap.
snippet.body: Ensure the subscriber’s KYC is up to date, note alternate contact numbers, and set expectations for activation time.

steps.step: Authenticate the customer with the registered ID and last recharge amount.
Check if the current SIM is suspended or barred.
Provide the nearest Airtel store details and document the visit ID.
